title: Doesn't support a name error at attempt to trigger "Report a bug" dialog without network and no dialog on shaking
body:
# Bug Report

## Problem
Can't open   "Submit a bug" dialog when offline

#### Expected behavior
- can see dialog on shaking
- no error, at least can seve a draft with logs

#### Actual behavior
![photo_2019-12-06 14 26 25](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4557972/70326357-ae4efe80-1834-11ea-8296-62c95b5603ed.jpeg)


### Reproduction

[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Open Status
- Go to offline
- Try to shake phone to get "Report a bug"
- Go to profile > Need help > Submit a bug

### Additional Information

[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
- Status version: nightly 06/12/2019
[comment]: # (Android or iOS.)
- Operating System: Android, iOS

#### Logs

[comment]: # (if on Android please replicate bug whilst running adb logcat)


Confirmed - fixed in v1.3.
Thank you for taking a look!
